dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5157 IH: To amend the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 to reauthorize and expand State-wide assessment and strategies for forest resources.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Salinas (for herself and Mr. Neguse) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 to reauthorize and expand State-wide assessment and strategies for forest resources.

section.header: State-wide assessment and strategies for forest resources
section.text: Section 2A(f) of the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 (16 U.S.C. 2101a(f)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;
in paragraph (2), by striking $10,000,000 and inserting $50,000,000; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Implementation of State-wide assessments and strategies for forest resources
paragraph.text: In addition to the authorization of appropriations in paragraph (1), there are authorized to be appropriated up to $40,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 through 2028 for the purposes of supporting the implementation of State-wide assessments and strategies for forest resources under this section.
